中风患者的新希望：辛辛那提大学试验测试独特的舌头锻炼装置加德纳神经科学研究所在 NIH 66 万美元拨款的支持下，正在开展一项试验，测试家庭舌头耐力练习，旨在改善中风幸存者的吞咽功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/New-hope-for-中风-病人-大学辛辛那提-试验-测试-unique-tongue-exercise-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/New-hope-for-中风-病人-大学辛辛那提-试验-测试-unique-tongue-exercise-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5e39e5c-78dd-41a2-9621-ab96e1e88a5a Thu, 11 Jan 2024 08:55:00 -0500 New hope for stroke patients: University of Cincinnati trial tests unique tongue exercise device
美国心脏协会优异奖获得者公布美国心脏协会 (AHA) 宣布其著名的优异奖获得者，以庆祝 100 年来的救生工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/American-Heart-Associations-merit-award-recipients-announced.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/American-Heart-Associations-merit-award-recipients-announced.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae53e91b-ff94-4881-a15b-fe934db2bb6a Thu, 11 Jan 2024 08:55:00 -0500 American Heart Association's merit award recipients announced
FluidForm Bio 通过 FRESH 3D 生物打印在构建人体心脏组织方面取得突破FluidForm Bio 是开发仿生人体组织来治疗疾病的领导者，分享了使用 FRESH™ 3D 生物打印构建人体心脏组织的最新进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/FluidForm-Bio-achieves-breakthrough-in-building- human-cardiac-tissues-with-FRESH-3D-bioprinting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/FluidForm-Bio-achieves-breakthrough-in-building- human-cardiac-tissues-with-FRESH-3D-bioprinting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35bcdc80-9f15-45b1-a8f8-4ef775829248 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 08:44:00 -0500 FluidForm Bio achieves breakthrough in building human cardiac tissues with FRESH 3D bioprinting
革命性的四生物标志物组合为早期卵巢癌检测带来了希望用于早期检测卵巢癌的生物标志物 CA125。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Revolutionary-four-biomarker-panel-offers-hope-for-early-ovarian-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Revolutionary-four-biomarker-panel-offers-hope-for-early-ovarian-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97d6cd6b-325e-4b17-806e-7cd2cdd79de5 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:31:00 -0500 Revolutionary four-biomarker panel offers hope for early ovarian cancer detection
在抑制青少年爱吃甜食方面，管理情绪比提升幸福感更有效吗？最近的一项研究探讨了情绪驱动的冲动或社会心理健康是否对健康或不健康的食物选择有更大的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Is-managing-emotions-more-efficient-than-boosting-wellbeing-in-curbing-teens-sweet-tooth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Is-managing-emotions-more-efficient-than-boosting-wellbeing-in-curbing-teens-sweet-tooth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcc75b4f-e4b9-4a26-98cb-ded855441210 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:23:00 -0500 Is managing emotions more effective than boosting wellbeing in curbing teens' sweet tooth?
2023 年，非吸烟者肺癌位居全球癌症相关死亡前五位从未吸烟的人患肺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Non-smokers-lung-cancer-among-top- Five-global-cancer-lated-deaths-in-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Non-smokers-lung-cancer-among-top- Five-global-cancer-lated-deaths-in-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aeee2fb8-a68c-4779-a541-0f00f18ff24d Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:04:00 -0500 Non-smokers' lung cancer among top five global cancer-related deaths in 2023
纽瑟姆重新审视 25 美元最低医疗工资，微妙的劳工行业协议不断变化加州州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 在批准该措施不到三个月后，正在重新考虑加州逐步实施全国领先的 25 美元卫生工作者最低工资的举措，因为预计赤字将达到 380 亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Delicate-labor-industry-deal-in-flux-as-Newsom-revisits-2425-minimum-health-wage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Delicate-labor-industry-deal-in-flux-as-Newsom-revisits-2425-minimum-health-wage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31a18b20-0c84-4c78-a8d4-9b99a4210c15 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:00:58 -0500 Delicate labor-industry deal in flux as Newsom revisits $25 minimum health wage
州合同的延误使蒙大拿州的医疗服务提供者陷入困境蒙大拿州卫生组织表示，州政府积压向承包商支付费用，这阻碍了他们提供医疗服务的能力，他们担心在资金到位后很长一段时间内，瓶颈的连锁反应仍将显现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Delays-in-state-contracts-leave-Montana-health-providers-strapped.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Delays-in-state-contracts-leave-Montana-health-providers-strapped.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d95c9f5d-78e6-4f09-85fc-3c08f490a991 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 05:59:35 -0500 Delays in state contracts leave Montana health providers strapped

揭示隐藏的潜力：用于神经科学研究疾病建模的类器官在我们最新的采访中，News-Medical 采访了 ACROBiosystems 的 Rosanna Zhang，讨论了在神经科学研究领域利用类器官进行疾病建模的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Unveiling-Hidden-Potential-Organoids-for-Disease-Modeling-in-Neuroscience-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Unveiling-Hidden-Potential-Organoids-for-Disease-Modeling-in-Neuroscience-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c72ebc9-7424-4488-b5e7-3906d86ef898 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 04:44:00 -0500 Unveiling Hidden Potential: Organoids for Disease Modeling in Neuroscience Research
